name: feaws-cross-chain-twap
description: Cross-Chain Yield-Gated TWAP using 1inch Limit Orders for ETHGlobal UNITE

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd contracts && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
scripts.deploy:sepolia: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-sepolia.js --network sepolia
scripts.deploy:etherlink: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy-etherlink.js --network etherlink
scripts.clean: cd contracts && npx hardhat clean && cd ../frontend && rm -rf .next

author: ETHGlobal UNITE Team
